GreenRoof.Description: A modular green roofing system that utilizes smart sensors to regulate water, sunlight, and nutrients, allowing urban spaces to contribute positively to the environment.

Applications.Name: Smart Irrigation
Applications.Description: The system detects soil moisture levels and provides optimal water quantities, reducing wastage and ensuring plant health.

Applications.Name: Pollinator Patches
Applications.Description: Specific sections within the GreenRoof™ are designed to attract and support urban pollinators like bees and butterflies.

Applications.Name: Air Purification Zones
Applications.Description: Incorporates certain plants known to absorb pollutants, promoting cleaner urban air and combating the urban heat island effect.

PureStream Filters.Description: Bio-engineered filters that harness the power of specific bacteria andplants to purify water without chemicals, making potable water accessible and sustainable.

Applications.Name: Microbial Cleansing
Applications.Description: Harnesses beneficial bacteria to break down harmful pathogens, ensuring water purity without chemical residues.

Applications.Name: Floating Gardens
Applications.Description: Aesthetically pleasing modules that float on water surfaces, removing heavy metals and other toxins using specific wetland plants

Applications.Name: Portable Units
Applications.Description: Compact, travel-friendly variants designed for trekkers and campers, ensuring access to clean water even in remote areas.

TerraCharge.Description: : Pathways made with special tiles that convert foot traffic into usable energy, illuminating pathways at night or powering nearby amenities

Applications.Name: Energy Storage
Applications.Description: Surplus energy from foot traffic during the day is stored in sleek, underground batteries, allowing extended use after dark.

Applications.Name: Intelligent Lighting
Applications.Description: The stored energy powers adaptive lighting systems that adjust based on ambient light and movement, ensuring pathways are well-lit without unnecessary energy consumption.

Applications.Name: Interactive Displays
Applications.Description: Some TerraCharge™ pathways feature interactive elements like ground-projected games or information graphics, all powered by pedestrian movement.

EcoLearn Hub.Description: : A digital platform offering educational courses on sustainable living, organic farming, and eco-technology innovations.

Applications.Name: DIY Workshops
Applications.Description: Practical sessions teaching users how to upcycle waste, create home gardens, or even set up solar panels.

Applications.Name: Children's Series
Applications.Description: Tailored courses introducing children to nature conservation, renewable energy, and the importance of biodiversity.

Applications.Name: Global Webinars
Applications.Description: Regular online sessions featuring guest experts in fields like permaculture, green architecture, and sustainable transportation. These webinars foster a community of eco-enthusiasts and offer the latest in green innovations.
